description: Gets the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration. For more information, see Assessing your storage activity and usage with Amazon S3 Storage Lens in the Amazon S3 User Guide. For a complete list of S3 Storage Lens metrics, see S3 Storage Lens metrics glossary in the Amazon S3 User Guide.

parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID of the requester.

nested_items.name: StorageLensConfiguration
nested_items.description: The S3 Storage Lens configuration requested.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A container for the Amazon S3 Storage Lens configuration ID.

nested_items.name: AccountLevel
nested_items.description: A container for all the account-level configurations of your S3 Storage Lens configuration.

nested_items.name: ActivityMetrics
nested_items.description: A container element for S3 Storage Lens activity metrics.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether activity metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: BucketLevel
nested_items.description: A container element for the S3 Storage Lens bucket-level configuration.

nested_items.name: ActivityMetrics
nested_items.description: A container for the bucket-level activity metrics for S3 Storage Lens.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether activity metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: PrefixLevel
nested_items.description: A container for the prefix-level metrics for S3 Storage Lens.

nested_items.name: StorageMetrics
nested_items.description: A container for the prefix-level storage metrics for S3 Storage Lens.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container for whether prefix-level storage metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: Delimiter
nested_items.description: A container for the delimiter of the selection criteria being used.

nested_items.name: MaxDepth
nested_items.description: The max depth of the selection criteria.

nested_items.name: MinStorageBytesPercentage
nested_items.description: The minimum number of storage bytes percentage whose metrics will be selected.

nested_items.name: AdvancedCostOptimizationMetrics
nested_items.description: A container for bucket-level advanced cost-optimization metrics for S3 Storage Lens.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether advanced cost-optimization metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: AdvancedDataProtectionMetrics
nested_items.description: A container for bucket-level advanced data-protection metrics for S3 Storage Lens.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether advanced data-protection metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: DetailedStatusCodesMetrics
nested_items.description: A container for bucket-level detailed status code metrics for S3 Storage Lens.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether detailed status code metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: AdvancedCostOptimizationMetrics
nested_items.description: A container element for S3 Storage Lens advanced cost-optimization metrics.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether advanced cost-optimization metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: AdvancedDataProtectionMetrics
nested_items.description: A container element for S3 Storage Lens advanced data-protection metrics.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether advanced data-protection metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: DetailedStatusCodesMetrics
nested_items.description: A container element for detailed status code metrics.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether detailed status code metrics are enabled.

nested_items.name: StorageLensGroupLevel
nested_items.description: A container element for S3 Storage Lens groups metrics.

nested_items.name: SelectionCriteria
nested_items.description: Indicates which Storage Lens group ARNs to include or exclude in the Storage Lens group aggregation. If this value is left null, then all Storage Lens groups are selected.

nested_items.name: Include
nested_items.description: Indicates which Storage Lens group ARNs to include in the Storage Lens group aggregation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Exclude
nested_items.description: Indicates which Storage Lens group ARNs to exclude from the Storage Lens group aggregation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Buckets
nested_items.description: A container for the S3 Storage Lens bucket includes.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Regions
nested_items.description: A container for the S3 Storage Lens Region includes.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Buckets
nested_items.description: A container for the S3 Storage Lens bucket excludes.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Regions
nested_items.description: A container for the S3 Storage Lens Region excludes.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DataExport
nested_items.description: A container to specify the properties of your S3 Storage Lens metrics export including, the destination, schema and format.

nested_items.name: S3BucketDestination
nested_items.description: A container for the bucket where the S3 Storage Lens metrics export will be located.

nested_items.name: OutputSchemaVersion
nested_items.description: The schema version of the export file.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID of the owner of the S3 Storage Lens metrics export bucket.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bucket. This property is read-only and follows the following format: arn:aws:s3:us-east-1:example-account-id:bucket/your-destination-bucket-name.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix of the destination bucket where the metrics export will be delivered.

nested_items.name: Encryption
nested_items.description: The container for the type encryption of the metrics exports in this bucket.

nested_items.name: KeyId
nested_items.description: A container for the ARN of the SSE-KMS encryption. This property is read-only and follows the following format: arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:example-account-id:key/example-9a73-4afc-8d29-8f5900cef44e.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchMetrics
nested_items.description: A container for enabling Amazon CloudWatch publishing for S3 Storage Lens metrics.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container that indicates whether CloudWatch publishing for S3 Storage Lens metrics is enabled. A value of true indicates that CloudWatch publishing for S3 Storage Lens metrics is enabled.

nested_items.name: IsEnabled
nested_items.description: A container for whether the S3 Storage Lens configuration is enabled.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: A container for the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services organization. This property is read-only and follows the following format: arn:aws:organizations:us-east-1:example-account-id:organization/o-ex2l495dck.

nested_items.name: StorageLensArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 Storage Lens configuration. This property is read-only and follows the following format: arn:aws:s3:us-east-1:example-account-id:storage-lens/your-dashboard-name.
